statements: SELECT visualization_name, data_source_id FROM metadata_visualization;
SELECT visualization_id, visualization_name, data_source_id, created_date FROM metadata_visualization;
SELECT * FROM metadata_visualization WHERE visualization_id = 1;
SELECT visualization_name AS name, data_source_id AS source FROM metadata_visualization WHERE visualization_id = 2;
SELECT visualization_id, visualization_name FROM metadata_visualization ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM metadata_visualization WHERE visualization_id = 1;
SELECT visualization_name, created_date FROM metadata_visualization WHERE data_source_id = 3 ORDER BY visualization_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(visualization_id) AS max_id FROM metadata_visualization;
SELECT visualization_name, data_source_id, DATE_FORMAT(created_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM metadata_visualization WHERE visualization_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT visualization_id, visualization_name FROM metadata_visualization WHERE visualization_name LIKE 'Sales%' ORDER BY created_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM visualizations;
SELECT id, name FROM data_sources;
SELECT name, url FROM data_sources WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM visualizations WHERE created_at > '2020-01-01';
SELECT id, name, url FROM data_sources ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM visualizations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, data_source FROM visualizations WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, data_source, created_at FROM visualizations WHERE data_source = 'Sales' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, name, data_source, updated_at FROM visualizations WHERE created_at >= '2021-01-01' AND updated_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT name AS visualization_name, url AS source_url FROM visualizations JOIN data_sources ON visualizations.data_source = data_sources.name WHERE data_sources.description LIKE '%analytics%';
SELECT * FROM data_sources LIMIT 5;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM data_sources WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM visualizations ORDER BY viz_name DESC;
SELECT id, viz_name, viz_type FROM visualizations WHERE data_source_id = 2;
SELECT id, foreign_key_check, data_source_check FROM data_integrity WHERE foreign_key_check = true;
SELECT * FROM data_sources ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, source_name, source_type FROM data_sources WHERE source_type = 'API';
SELECT d.id, v.viz_name, v.viz_type, d.created_at FROM data_sources d JOIN visualizations v ON d.id = v.data_source_id WHERE v.viz_type = 'Chart' ORDER BY d.created_at DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT d.source_name, v.viz_name, di.foreign_key_check FROM data_sources d JOIN visualizations v ON d.id = v.data_source_id JOIN data_integrity di ON v.id = di.visualization_id WHERE di.foreign_key_check = TRUE ORDER BY d.source_name, v.viz_name;

SELECT d.source_name AS source, d.source_type AS type, COUNT(v.id) AS num_visualizations FROM data_sources d LEFT JOIN visualizations v ON d.id = v.data_source_id GROUP BY d.source_name, d.source_type HAVING COUNT(v.id) > 0 ORDER BY num_visualizations DESC, type ASC;
SELECT * FROM metadata_visualizations;
SELECT visualization_name, data_source FROM metadata_visualizations ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT source_name, connection_string FROM data_sources WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_description, activity_date FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM data_integrity ORDER BY check_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM metadata_visualizations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT visualization_name, created_date FROM metadata_visualizations WHERE data_source = 'Database A' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT source_name, last_updated FROM data_sources WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_description FROM user_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT data_source_id, integrity_check, check_date FROM data_integrity JOIN data_sources ON data_sources.id = data_integrity.data_source_id ORDER BY check_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM visualization_sources;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM visualization_sources ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT source_name, COUNT(*) AS num_data_points FROM visualization_data GROUP BY source_id;
SELECT source_name, data_value, data_date FROM visualization_data WHERE data_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM user_permissions WHERE source_id = '7d8213b4-93d0-4d75-b63f-4785e4398928';
SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT source_id, data_value FROM visualization_data WHERE data_date = '2021-12-15';
SELECT source_name, date_created FROM visualization_sources ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT source_name, permission_type FROM visualization_sources INNER JOIN user_permissions ON visualization_sources.source_id = user_permissions.source_id;
SELECT * FROM data_integrity_log WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND log_message LIKE '%error%';
